text: "Precious Love" is a song by American singer-songwriter Bob Welch. It was released as a single in 1979 from his album Three Hearts. The song is Welch's final Top 40 hit, peaking at #19 on the Billboard Hot 100. ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (1979) ! title: Precious Love (Bob Welch song)
